StudyBuddy unleashes the power of Pomodoro like never before, transforming every study session into a laser-focused sprint that obliterates distractions. Its sleek, intuitive interface and fully customizable intervals keep you locked in and on track, turning time management into an art form. Engineered with passion and expertise by Naga Harish Madhav M, StudyBuddy is your ultimate productivity ally.

The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks. Each interval is known as a pomodoro, from the Italian word for tomato, after the tomato-shaped kitchen timer that Francesco Cirillo used as a university student.

1. Set your focus and break durations in the Settings.
2. Start the timer and focus on your task until the timer rings.
3. Take a short break when alerted.
4. Repeat the process.
5. Track your progress in the Stats tab.
